info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mecklenburg and central York Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near York, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, York, Southwest Charlotte, Fort Mill, Pineville, Tega Cay, Newport, Charlotte Douglas Airport, Steele Creek and Carowinds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
